resources.string: Swipe down to reload the map

string-array.name: tipsDesc
string-array.item: Normal skin typically requires regular moisturizing and cleansing to maintain its balance.
Oily skin requires extra cleansing to control oil production.
Dry skin needs intensive moisturizing and non-irritating skincare.
Acne-prone skin requires specialized treatment to reduce inflammation and prevent new breakouts.
